DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria RouxenY Gastric Bypass ( RYGB ) Subjects : Subjects undergo RYGB Inclusion Criteria Healthy Subjects : Must match RYGB subject age , weight , gender Subjects without active systemic illness Exclusion Criteria Subjects : Subjects < 20 year old > 70 year old For Female Subjects : positive pregnancy text time enrollment study Subjects functional organic bowel symptom .
